verses.verse: There is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and it is <S%H7227>common<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H120>men:<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> so that he <S%H2638>wants<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H183>desires,<s%> yet <S%H430>God<s%> gives him not <S%H7980>power<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, but a <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H5237><s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> it: <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2483>disease.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3205>beget<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> children, and <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> so that the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H8141>years<s%> be <S%H7227>many,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> be not <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> that he <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6900>burial;<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> that an <S%H5309>untimely<s%> <S%H5309>birth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than he.
For he <S%H935>comes<s%> in with <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and <S%H3212>departs<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> he has not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> any thing: <S%H2088>this<s%> has more <S%H5183>rest<s%> than the <S%H2088>other.<s%>

<S%H432>Yes,<s%> though he <S%H2421>live<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%> told, yet has he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2896>good:<s%> do not <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5999>labor<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is for his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1571>yet<s%> the <S%H5315>appetite<s%> is not <S%H4390>filled.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> has the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3148>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3684>fool?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> has the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> that <S%H3045>knows<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H2416>living?<s%>

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than the <S%H1981>wandering<s%> of the <S%H5315>desire:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

That which has <S%H1961>been<s%> is <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121><s%> <S%H3528>already,<s%> and it is <S%H3045>known<s%> that it is <S%H120>man:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3201>may<s%> he <S%H1777>contend<s%> with him that is <S%H8623>mightier<s%> than he.

For <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> in this <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H1892>vain<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> which he <S%H6213>spends<s%> as a <S%H6738>shadow?<s%> for <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5046>tell<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun?<s%>
